mapper.select: select * from (select *from RWRECMAT where RWRECMAT.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMAT.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMAT.recnum=#{recnum}) A, (select *from RWRECMATIMAGE where RWRECMATIMAGE.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recnum=#{recnum}) B , bzfimage.Tbbwimage C where A.RECMATNUM = B.RECMATNUM and B.IMAGEDESCID = C.IMAGEDESCID

select * from (select *from RWRECMAT where RWRECMAT.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMAT.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMAT.recnum=#{recnum}) A, (select *from RWRECMATIMAGE where RWRECMATIMAGE.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recnum=#{recnum}) B , bzfimage.Tbbwimage C where A.RECMATNUM = B.RECMATNUM and B.RECMATNUM = #{recmatnum} and B.IMAGEDESCID = C.IMAGEDESCID

select * from (select *from RWRECMAT where RWRECMAT.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMAT.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMAT.recnum=#{recnum}) A, (select *from RWRECMATIMAGE where RWRECMATIMAGE.optypenum=#{optypenum} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recyear=#{recyear} and RWRECMATIMAGE.recnum=#{recnum}) B , bzfimage.Tbbwimage C where A.RECMATNUM = B.RECMATNUM and B.RECMATNUM = #{recmatnum} and B.IMAGEDESCID = C.IMAGEDESCID
select * from RWRECMAT where optypenum= #{optypenum} and recyear= #{recyear} and recnum= #{recnum}
